price: 8. En gedenk de naam van jouw Heer en wijd jezelf volledig aan Hem toe.
arabic: وَٱذۡكُرِ ٱسۡمَ رَبِّكَ وَتَبَتَّلۡ إِلَيۡهِ تَبۡتِيلٗا

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: wa-udh'kuri is'ma rabbika watabattal ilayhi tabtīlan
